```{r}
library(tidyverse)
data(iris)
head(iris)

#transform dataset by removing sepal columns 
library(dplyr)

iris.petal <- iris %>% select(-Sepal.Length)
iris.petal2 <- iris.petal %>% select(-Sepal.Width)
head(iris.petal2)
```
